modName: Evil book replacer for reading animations
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] What this does [/b] 
[color=yellow] This mod changes the book that you read when animated. [/color]
Meaning, whenever any NPC or the player initiate the reading idle animation the book being read
will be the replacer book you have chosen.

I also recently found that the book chosen is littered through Dragonborn. A very nice surprise for me. So....Dragonborn compatible....check.

 [b] why? [/b]

NPC\'s reading evil books. That pleases me. More so, I like my characters to read it when I choose to make them read. I like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13931] Dovahkiin Relaxes Too by wgstein [/url] for my reading needs.

[b] instructions [/b]

Choose only one file to install at a time. They are the same texture name. I suggest NMM, though you can use any method you wish. You will need some form of archive invalidation if you don\'t use NMM.

[b] make one [/b]

The file is book01a.dds that I modified. I also added a book01aFake.dds to the data/textures/clutter/books for the basicbook01.nif in the data/meshes/clutter/books folders.

Changing the book01a.dds will affect the read animation book. I made a dummy BasicBook01.nif that references an unchanged texture renamed book01aFake.dds. This lets the game still find the texture for WorldObjects. Deleting said .nif will render any brown book with a worn cover as the book of choice when laying in the game world.

[b] Change log [/b]

[b] v3 [/b]

Added a \"bump map\". Makes the books look clean, if that\'s something you like.

[b] v2 [/b]

Only the books being read are the chosen books now.

[b] v1 [/b]

Every basicbook01 is your chosen book. Use only if you want to see them around.
